name: Phantom Alien
description:
You are a scientist of Area 51 and one of your Aliens sneaked out at night and ate a human child. Since it snugged back into the lab before you could notice its disappearance, you do not know which Alien actually did it.
You have to find out before the Alien can unleash its true power!

Investigate! Talk to the inhabitants of Roswell and reconstruct the miscreant!

__________________________________________________________

 We are Team Ginga Inga and we worked on this game during a 30 hours Game Jam at Kolibri Games' Experience Jam. Theme: Area 51
